snippet: A French judge awarded Scarlett Johansson about $3,400 in a suit over a novel with a character who resembles her.
abstract: A French judge awarded Scarlett Johansson about $3,400 in a suit over a novel with a character who resembles her.

headline.main: Johansson Wins Suit Over a Lookalike Character
headline.print_headline: Johansson Wins a Suit Against a French Novelist
